channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Iran arrests protest leaders as crackdown intensifies amid threat of US intervention
item.description: Washington and Tehran step up war of words over Donald Trump’s threat to intervene in response to unrest Iranian authorities have arrested key members...

item.title: Draft ‘Farage clause’ would ensure EU not out of pocket if Reform UK wins election
item.description: Termination clause is a stark reminder of EU’s colossal fund to help member states cope with Brexit The EU is reportedly demanding guarantees the UK w...

item.title: Mandelson praises Trump’s ‘graciousness’ and declines to apologise for friendship with Jeffrey Epstein – as it happened
item.description: In first TV interview since he was sacked as UK ambassador to US, Mandelson says association with Epstein was ‘terrible mistake’ but adds: ‘I was not ...

item.title: Smithsonian swaps Trump portrait and removes mention of impeachments
item.description: National Portrait Gallery removes text on new portrait of Trump standing in Oval Office with a scowl and fists on desk The National Portrait Gallery i...

item.title: Four die in collision between taxi and car in Bolton
item.description: Crash took place on Wigan Road in the early hours of Sunday, killing drivers of both vehicles as well as two passengers Four people have died in a col...

item.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks as protesters defy crackdown
item.description: Medics at two hospitals tell the BBC more than 100 bodies have been brought in over a two day period.

item.title: Tories would ban under-16s from social media
item.description: Kemi Badenoch has promised to follow the example of Australia, which became the first country to introduce the policy last month.

item.title: Trump won't take Greenland by force, Mandelson says
item.description: The former UK ambassador to the US tells the BBC the president's advisers would likely warn him against the move.

item.title: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby

item.title: Cold snap set to ease ahead of wet and windy week
item.description: Milder conditions are expected after days of snow, ice and strong winds.
